EN.name: SUMMARY
EN.data: Seasoned Front-End/Full Stack Engineer with 6+ years in major tech firms, adept in multi-platform development including JavaScript, Node.js, HTML/CSS, React, React Native etc. Proven track record in optimizing web applications and advancing cross-platform projects. Committed to leveraging technical innovation to enhance user experience and drive product evolution.

data.title: Software Engineer
description: Spearheaded the development and launch of TikTok's Live Wallet and official website recharge page, successfully expanding recharge services to 50+ countries. Tech Stack: React, TypeScript.
Led the team to build a frontend monitoring system, reducing online incidents by ~30% and boosting R&D efficiency by ~20%.
Oversaw the overhaul and day-to-day maintenance of the wallet's backend management system. Tech Stack: Node.js, React.
Contributed to the design and implementation of the Arena platform's permission system, now utilized by 10+ business units. Tech Stack: Node.js, MySQL.
Actively involved in the micro-frontend architecture upgrade of Arena, ensuring stable module migration and code refactoring.

data.title: Fullstack Engineer
description: Directed the tech stack migration from C# & jQuery to React & Node, achieving a 30%+ page speed boost.
Established a universal component library with a unit test coverage of 90%, and actively promoted tech sharing within the team.
Achieved a ~50% performance optimization of the hotel details page through various tech enhancements.

data.title: Frontend Engineer
description: Participated in the development of the company's inaugural website, achieving an aesthetically pleasing UI and high-performance browsing experience.
Led the cross-platform development of the data analytics app using React Native.

data.title: Frontend Engineer
description: Engaged in the R&D of the smart design app, primarily using React Native.
Independently built a documentation management system, employing tech stacks like Node.js, MongoDB, React, and Bootstrap.
